build.buildCommand: echo '--- Creating STATIC_ROOT directory ---' && mkdir -p /app/backend/staticfiles && echo '--- Changing to backend dir ---' && cd backend && echo '--- Installing requirements ---' && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && echo '--- Running collectstatic ---' && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput --clear && echo '--- Listing new STATIC_ROOT (/app/backend/staticfiles) ---' && ls -la /app/backend/staticfiles && echo '--- Build command finished ---'
